review: I had visited Dr. Patel.initially for a broken finger and he was an nice and explains the meds to his patients. Answers all Thier questions patiently. However during the visit the nurse who was supposed to give me a pinkiller on bum instead gave me an injection on my waist. I then visited Thier hospital today ended up meeting the emergency lady doctor who looks at the rash  and says that it is not because of the injectiob whereas it is in the exact same place where th nurse gives the injection *** **** * **** ** **** * **** *********** *** ******** ******* *** *** ******* ** ****** ** *** ******* *** ********** *** *** **** *************** will certainly never visit the hospital again.

Barely took a minute for him to recommend a surgery costing 30-35k for * ***** fracture. Luckily decided to look for a second opinion, ** ******* ******************** ** **** ****** ***** *** ******* ******** ****** ****** ** ****** ******** * *** ****. get a second opinion before taking this doctor's advice.

Visited the doctor for a wrist injury. Whatever he told i followed, *** ** ****** ******* **** ***** * ****** Have done the physiotherapy also as he has suggested *** ** ************ The physiotherapist infact suggested to consult some other doctor. Now looking for another doctor.
